oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sunbonnet Sue quilt detail

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quilts; Quilting
Quilts; Quilting; Folk art
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sunbonnet Sue is an applique pattern that probably dates to the 1870s, although the name "Sunbonnet Sue" itself dates to 1908. The pattern is also called Dutch Doll, Bonnie Bonnet, or Sunbonnet Babies.
